extension.summary: Transmission: a fast, easy and free BitTorrent client
extension.description: Transmission is a fast, easy and free BitTorrent client. Ported from OpenELEC transmission add-on, this has be re-compiled for Cortex-A9. Transmission can be accessed on a remote web browser via: http://[xbmcIP]:9091

extension.summary: InternetPVR is a Media tracking suit which combines the programs: SickBeard, CouchPotato V2 and Headphones in one Addon
extension.description:
- Sickbeard: Tracks your TVShows and automatically downloads the next one when it becomes available. - Couchpotato: Automatically searches for and downloads your Movie torrents according to your requests. - Headphones: Automatically searches for and downloads Music.
InternetPVR is a fork of lsellens' SickPotatoHead.

extension.summary: Audo (Automatic Downloader) is a fork of SABnzbd-Suite. SABnzbd-Suite Metapackage which combines SABnzbd, SickBeard, Couchpotato and Headphones in one Addon
Audo (Automatische Downloader) is een afsplitsing van SABnzbd-Suite. Sabnzbd-Suite metapackage die SABNZBD, SickBeard, Couchpotato en Headphones combineert in een add-on.
Audo (pour Automatic Downloader) est un fork de SABnzbd-Suite. SABnzbd-Suite méta-paquet qui combine SABnzbd, SickBeard, Couchpotato et Headphones dans un add-on.
O Audo (Automatic Downloader) é uma derivação da SABnzbd-Suite. O Metapacote SABnzbd-Suite combina o SABnzbd, SickBeard, Couchpotato e Headphones num único Addon
extension.description: Audo (Automatic Downloader) is a fork of SABnzbd-Suite. Updated frequently to newest versions of SAB, SB(mr.orange branch), CPv2, and HP.
Audo (Automatische Downloader) is een afsplitsing van SABnzbd-Suite. Wordt frequent geüpdatet naar de nieuwste versies van SAB, SB-mr.orange Branch, CPv2, en HP.
Audo (pour Automatic Downloader) est un fork de SABnzbd-Suite. Mis à jour fréquemment vers les nouvelles versions de la branche SAB, SB-mr.orange, CPv2 et HP.
O Audo (Automatic Downloader) é uma derivação da SABnzbd-Suite. É actualizado frequentemente para as mais recentes versões de SAB, ramo SB-mr.orange, CPv2, e HP.
Download and install addons by TinyHTPC
